nodes.description: Mughniyeh被美以列为通缉犯，涉嫌1980年代黎巴嫩西方人质事件
nodes.support_text: Mughniyeh is widely believed to be behind a wave of Western hostage-taking in Lebanon during the 1980s.

nodes.description: Mughniyeh在黎巴嫩卡法尔苏萨区遭自杀式爆炸身亡，现场遭叙利亚警方封锁
nodes.support_text: Syrian police kept media and other onlookers well away from the scene of the overnight blast in the well-to-do Kafar Soussa district.

nodes.description: Hezbollah通过Manar电视台宣布Mughniyeh为烈士，宣布举行葬礼
nodes.support_text: Hezbollah-owned Manar TV in Beirut announced the death saying: "With all pride we declare a great jihadist leader of the Islamic resistance in Lebanon joining the martyrs... the brother commander hajj Imad Mughniyeh".

nodes.description: 叙利亚政府确认Mughniyeh死亡并启动调查，谴责袭击为恐怖主义
nodes.support_text: Later, the Syrian government confirmed Mughniyeh had been killed and said investigations were still underway to find the perpetrators.

nodes.description: 伊朗谴责以色列并称其为'国家恐怖主义'，Hezbollah宣布葬礼日期
nodes.support_text: Iran also condemned the killing, praising Mughniyeh as a martyr and describing the attack as "yet another brazen example of organised state terrorism by the Zionist regime".

nodes.description: 以色列总理办公室否认参与刺杀，称恐怖组织试图嫁祸
nodes.support_text: The Israeli prime minister's office later issued a statement rejecting "the attempt by terror groups to attribute to it any involvement" in the killing.

nodes.description: 美国国务院称Mughniyeh为'冷血杀手'，摩萨德前局长称其死亡是'世界胜利'
nodes.support_text: A former head of Israel's Mossad secret service, Danny Yatom, called the killing "a big achievement for the free world against terrorist organisations".

nodes.description: Mughniyeh被指控1985年劫持TWA客机致美国海军 diver死亡
nodes.support_text: Mughniyeh was among several suspects indicted in the US for the 1985 hijacking of a TWA airliner in which a US Navy diver was killed.

nodes.description: Mughniyeh被指控策划1992年以色列驻阿根廷使馆爆炸案致29人死亡
nodes.support_text: Israel believes he was involved in planning the 1992 bombing of Israel's embassy in Argentina in which 29 people were killed.

nodes.description: Mughniyeh被指控策划1994年布宜诺斯艾利斯犹太中心爆炸案致95人死亡
nodes.support_text: the blast at a Buenos Aires Jewish centre two years later that killed 95.

nodes.description: Hezbollah成立于1982年黎以战争期间，由什叶派教士组建
nodes.support_text: Hezbollah was founded in 1982 by a group of Shia Muslim clerics after the Israeli invasion of Lebanon.

nodes.description: Hezbollah在2006年黎以战争期间成为重要军事力量
nodes.support_text: Hezbollah has emerged in recent years as a major political and military force in Lebanon, after military successes against Israel.

nodes.description: Hezbollah在1983年策划贝鲁特自杀式爆炸案，造成数百名美法军人死亡
nodes.support_text: Shia militants who went on to become members are thought to have planned some of the most high-profile kidnappings and attacks of the 1980s, including the 1983 suicide bombings in Beirut that killed hundreds of US and French service personnel.

nodes.description: 多方来源描述穆格尼耶的职务
nodes.support_text: 多方来源描述穆格尼耶的职务

nodes.description: 叙利亚政府表示调查仍在进行
nodes.support_text: Later, the Syrian government confirmed Mughniyeh had been killed and said investigations were still underway to find the perpetrators.

nodes.description: 暗杀前总理拉菲克·哈里里
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：暗杀前总理拉菲克·哈里里
Mughniyeh was among several suspects indicted in the US for the 1985 hijacking of a TWA airliner in which a US Navy diver was killed.
Mughniyeh was involved in planning the 1992 bombing of Israel's embassy in Argentina in which 29 people were killed.

edges.support_text: Hezbollah-owned Manar TV in Beirut announced the death saying: "With all pride we declare a great jihadist leader of the Islamic resistance in Lebanon joining the martyrs... the brother commander hajj Imad Mughniyeh".
Later, the Syrian government confirmed Mughniyeh had been killed and said investigations were still underway to find the perpetrators.
多方来源描述穆格尼耶的职务
Iran also condemned the killing, praising Mughniyeh as a martyr and describing the attack as "yet another brazen example of organised state terrorism by the Zionist regime".
The Israeli prime minister's office later issued a statement rejecting "the attempt by terror groups to attribute to it any involvement" in the killing.
A former head of Israel's Mossad secret service, Danny Yatom, called the killing "a big achievement for the free world against terrorist organisations".
Mughniyeh was among several suspects indicted in the US for the 1985 hijacking of a TWA airliner in which a US Navy diver was killed.
Israel believes he was involved in planning the 1992 bombing of Israel's embassy in Argentina in which 29 people were killed.
the blast at a Buenos Aires Jewish centre two years later that killed 95.
Hezbollah was founded in 1982 by a group of Shia Muslim clerics after the Israeli invasion of Lebanon.

Shia militants who went on to become members are thought to have planned some of the most high-profile kidnappings and attacks of the 1980s, including the 1983 suicide bombings in Beirut that killed hundreds of US and French service personnel.
Hezbollah has emerged in recent years as a major political and military force in Lebanon, after military successes against Israel.
